articles.title: Fed critics sound off on its disastrous inflation fight and obsession with 2%: ‘Great solution, guys, congratulations. You’ve done a miracle’ - Fortune
articles.description: What cost is the Fed willing to pay to get back to 2% inflation as soon as possible? “It’s a classic tradeoff between sending a battalion in to be slaughtered so that your army can win, or trying in some fashion to minimize the losses.”
